content: Select sections for import. They will appear in the corresponding sections of {{productName}}.

comment.text: This translation key is used to describe the action of selecting sections for import in various data import steps. It explains that selected sections will appear in corresponding sections of {{productName}} and is typically displayed as part of a button label or dialog description.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word "входиране" (vhodirane) is not the standard or most natural way to say "import" in Bulgarian. A more appropriate term would be "внос" (vnos).
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Изберете секции за внос. Те ще се появят в съответните секции на {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "Ne ilmestyvät vastaaviin {{productName}}-n osioihin" is not the most natural way to express "They will appear in the corresponding sections of {{productName}}". The '-n' suffix doesn't quite fit the intended meaning.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Valitse tuontikelpoiset osiot. Ne sijoittuvat vastaaviin {{productName}}-osiin.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "l'espace {{productName}}" is a less natural way to say "{{productName}}". A more appropriate translation would be "{{productName}}" directly.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Sélectionnez les sections à importer. Ces sections apparaîtront dans les sections appropriées de {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'They will appear in the corresponding sections of {{productName}}' is translated as 'このセクションは、{{productName}}の対応するセクションに表示されます。'. While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward in Japanese. A more natural phrasing would be something like '{{productName}}の対応するセクションに反映されます' or '{{productName}}の該当するセクションに適用されます'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: インポートしたセクションは、{{productName}}の対応するセクションに反映されます。

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase "가져오기할 섹션을 선택하세요" could be improved. While technically correct, it's a bit stiff and less natural for a UI context. A more natural phrasing would be something like "가져올 섹션을 선택하세요" or "섹션을 가져오기 위해 선택하세요".
The phrase "{{productName}}의 해당 섹션에 표시됩니다" is acceptable, but it could be more user-friendly.  A more natural phrasing would be '{{productName}}에 나타납니다.' or '{{productName}}에서 표시됩니다.'
The pronoun 'Eles' (They) is grammatically incorrect. The sections are not male, so the correct pronoun should be feminine ('Elas').
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Selecione seções para importação. Elas aparecerão nas seções correspondentes do {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The pronoun 'Eles' (they) doesn't agree in gender with 'seções' (sections), which is feminine. It should be 'Elas'.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Selecione seções para importação. Elas aparecerão nas seções correspondentes do {{productName}}.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The phrase 'Aceste secţiuni vor apărea' could be improved for better flow. While technically correct, it sounds slightly awkward in Romanian.

The translation 'ආයාත කිරීමට කොටස් තෝරන්න. ඒවා {{productName}} හි උචිත කොටස්වල දිස් වනු ඇත.' is not the most natural or accurate rendering of 'Select sections for import. They will appear in the corresponding sections of {{productName}}.' The word 'උචිත' (uchita) which means 'suitable' or 'appropriate' doesn't quite fit the context. It implies a suitability aspect that isn't present in the original English.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ආයාත කිරීමට කොටස් තෝරන්න. ඒවා {{productName}} හි පිළිවූ කොටස්වල දිස් වනු ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: While not strictly incorrect, 'ආයාත කිරීමට' (Ayathakarima) could be shortened to 'ආයාත' (Ayatha) for a more conversational tone in Sinhala. It's a stylistic preference, but generally makes the text flow better.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: ආයාත කිරීමට කොටස් තෝරන්න. ඒවා {{productName}} හි උචිත කොටස්වල දිස් වනු ඇත.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The Serbian translation includes a hyphenated possessive suffix '{{productName}}-а'. It's unclear if this is the correct grammatical form and whether the hyphenation is intentional and appropriate for the tone of the text. It would be best to confirm this with a native Serbian speaker familiar with the product's intended style.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider alternative possessive forms, e.g., '{{productName}}-е' or restructuring the sentence to avoid the possessive entirely, depending on the desired tone and grammatical precision. Consultation with a native speaker is recommended.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The possessive suffix '-a' is attached to '{{productName}}'. While grammatically correct, it might feel slightly unnatural or overly formal in this context. Consider whether it's necessary.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Consider removing the '-a' and simply use '{{productName}}' for a slightly more conversational tone.  Alternatively, investigate if there's a preferred Serbian style guide regarding possessives in UI text.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The placeholder {{productName}} is present in the English content and should be preserved in the Turkish translation.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Ensure the placeholder {{productName}} is correctly rendered in the translation.

ai_spell_check_issues.description: The word 'простору' (prostoru) translates to 'space' and doesn't accurately convey the meaning of 'corresponding sections' in the English context. It implies a separate space rather than within the {{productName}} application itself.
ai_spell_check_issues.suggestion: Виберіть розділи для імпорту. Вони з’являться у відповідних секціях {{productName}}.
